Our elegant and picturesque venue boasts stunning outdoor spaces, serene ceremony areas and a sophisticated ballroom for your reception, creating the perfect setting for your special day. Enchanting Outdoor Spaces Exchange vows against the lush, verdant backdrop of our meticulously manicured golf course, surrounded by canopies of Spanish-moss adorned oak trees and vibrant tropical foliage. Our beautifully landscaped gardens, charming “kissing bridge” and water features provide ample photography opportunities to capture your dream wedding ceremony, and offer a serene and romantic ambiance for your cocktail hour. Sophisticated Indoor Elegance For your reception, our grand ballroom exudes timeless sophistication, with high ceilings, sparkling chandeliers and floor-to-ceiling windows that flood the room with natural light and panoramic views overlooking our golf course. Guests are first greeted by stepping through the ornate wooden double doors and into the Ballroom Foyer, then into a second set of ornately-designed wooden double doors into the uniquely-shaped 3,000 square foot ballroom. Offering both plated and buffet meal and service options, even our buffet has its own space, just outside of the ballroom, allowing seamless service and maintenance, and doors to close once your meal service has concluded. Unparalleled Service & Amenities At Mystic Dunes Golf Club, our number one priority is ensuring that your wedding day is nothing short of extraordinary. Our dedicated and experienced catering director, who will also act as your day-of wedding coordinator, will work closely with you to curate a customized menu and design the perfect atmosphere to bring your wedding vision to life, guiding you through every step of the planning process, from vendor recommendations, timeline management, to floor diagram design, all with the absolute intent of guaranteeing a seamless and stress-free experience, from start to finish. Additionally, our resort-style amenities, including luxurious accommodations, four pools and world-class golf, provide the perfect venue for your entire wedding weekend. Celebrate Your Love in Florida As a premier wedding venue in the heart of Florida, Mystic Dunes Golf Club offers couples the opportunity to exchange vows in a truly breathtaking setting. Whether you envision an intimate gathering or a grand affair, our dedicated team is committed to making your wedding dreams a reality. Contact us today to start planning your happily ever after. Our Wedding Venue The Grand Ballroom 3,000 square feet Capacity: 150 The Veranda Patio Available for wedding ceremonies All-Inclusive Custom Wedding Packages Resort Package Inclusions Complimentary overnight stay in an elegant one-bedroom villa Complimentary round of golf for two Event Package Inclusions Day-of wedding coordination Fully inclusive catering package with competitive pricing Newly renovated ballroom Six hours of event time, including ceremony One-hour cocktail reception with tray-passed hors d’oeuvres Champagne toast Cake-cutting service Elegant Chiavari chairs 72″ round tables, with your choice of floor-length poly linens and napkins more than 50 colors to choose from Table centerpieces Charger plates Votive candle holders For more information regarding our wedding offerings, please contact our wedding professional Rick Martin at (407) 787-5636 , or complete the form below. We look forward to helping you plan and execute your special day! Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. We are your immediate resource for all your tournament and event-planning needs. Mystic Dunes Golf Club is structured to support organizations of all sizes host successful and profitable golf tournaments. Our extensive tournament planning experience has helped us develop and utilize the right people, event venues, network, and systems needed to plan tournaments and events with successful and profitable results. With Mystic Dunes Golf Club , you do not need to reinvent the wheel. We have a proven track record of hosting and organizing tournaments and events for associations, charities, schools and universities, churches and ministries, civic groups and foundations, and businesses and corporations. For more information please contact Rick Martin at Rick.Martin@hgv.com . Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. Mystic Dunes Golf Club ⛳️ Book Golf Online • golfscape™ Explore Destinations Help Log In Sign Up Language Currency How can we help? How can I book a tee time? 1 Navigate to your preferred golf course. Select your date of play, tee time, rentals, and number of players – and then click Book. You will receive an instant email confirmation and your tee time will be guaranteed at the course. Can I modify or cancel a booking? 1 Absolutely! If you are within the cancellation policy of your tee time, navigate to the Manage Booking page to modify or cancel your booking. What is your cancellation policy? 1 You can typically cancel your booking for a full refund within 48 hours of your tee time, but this may vary slightly by course. Cancellation policies are defined by each golf course and are clearly marked during the entire booking process as well as in your email confirmation. Why should I book with golfscape? 1 We are the only service who’s technology operates at all our partner courses – that means tee times and rates on golfscape are sourced directly. So when you make a booking, your reservation is confirmed instantly at the golf course. How can I get more help? 1 You may communicate with us anytime using the button below or email us at [email protected] – we’re happy to help! Contact us Get Started Create Account or sign up with Log In Forgot Password? Log In or log in with Profile My Bookings Log Out Orlando Golf Courses Mystic Dunes Golf Club Mystic Dunes Golf Club Orlando Golf Courses Next Previous Show all photos Instant Booking Confirmation Trusted by 1M+ Golfers Free Changes & Cancellations Mystic Dunes Golf Club, located outside of sunny Orlando, Florida is a 4 ½ star rated, 72-par public course. The course was designed by Champions Tour Player and NBC Golf Analyst, Gary Koch and offers players two distinctly different but equally challenging and enjoyable nines. Corporate & Private Events - Mystic Dunes Golf Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content BOOK TEE TIMES Follow us on Facebook X Instagram Mystic Dunes Golf Club Celebration, FL Home Golf The Course Course Gallery Course Tour Scorecard Play Mystic Dunes Multi-Play Pass Dunes Club Instruction Practice Facilities Weddings & Events Wedding Packages Photo Gallery & Testimonials Corporate & Private Events Meet Our Planner Group Golf & Outings DINING Kenzie’s Restaurant & Pub STARBUCKS MINI BARISTA Stay & Play Stay and Play Mystic Dunes Resort Contact Careers Menu Home Golf The Course Course Gallery Course Tour Scorecard Play Mystic Dunes Multi-Play Pass Dunes Club Instruction Practice Facilities Weddings & Events Wedding Packages Photo Gallery & Testimonials Corporate & Private Events Meet Our Planner Group Golf & Outings DINING Kenzie’s Restaurant & Pub STARBUCKS MINI BARISTA Stay & Play Stay and Play Mystic Dunes Resort Contact Careers Corporate & Private Events The Perfect Venue for Your Corporate Retreat or Private Event Welcome to Mystic Dunes Golf Club, a premier destination for your corporate meetings, team-building activities and private events in Orlando, Florida. Nestled amid the serene natural beauty of Central Florida, our newly updated golf course and exceptionally renovated facilities provide the perfect backdrop for your next unforgettable gathering. Exceptional Facilities for Memorable Events At Mystic Dunes, we understand the importance of creating a lasting impression for your guests. Our versatile 3,000 square foot event space can accommodate groups from 15 to 150 and can be set up in many configurations with either round or classroom-style tables. Equipped with state-of-the-art audiovisual technology and impeccable catering services, our on-site, day-of event planner ensures that your event runs seamlessly from start to finish. Unparalleled Golf Experience Get out of the board room and enhance your event with some outdoor experiences on Mystic Dunes’ 18-hole championship course, designed by the renowned golf architect Gary Panks, or events on our practice facilities. Whether you’re hosting a corporate golf tournament or a team-building activity, your guests will be captivated by the course’s breathtaking vistas and meticulously maintained fairways. Exceptional Hospitality & Personalized Service At Mystic Dunes, we pride ourselves on our exceptional hospitality and personalized service. Our dedicated event planning team will work closely with you to understand your unique needs and preferences, ensuring that every detail of your event is tailored to your specifications. From customized catering menus to bespoke event decor, we will go above and beyond to make your event a resounding success. Convenient Location and Accommodations Conveniently located in the heart of Central Florida, Mystic Dunes Golf Club is easily accessible from major transportation hubs and offers a variety of on-site resort accommodation options to suit your guests’ needs. Whether you’re planning a day-long meeting or a multi-day retreat, our central location and ample lodging choices make it easy for your attendees to immerse themselves in the event experience. Elevate Your Next Event at Mystic Dunes Golf Club Experience the perfect blend of world-class facilities, exceptional hospitality and stunning natural surroundings at Mystic Dunes Golf Club. Contact us today to start planning your unforgettable corporate retreat or private event in sunny Florida. Corporate meetings, seminars, retreats and conferences Holiday parties Milestone birthdays Anniversary parties Family and class reunions Rehearsal dinners Receptions Showers Athletic banquets Quinceaneras and sweet 16s Our Facilities Ballroom A Ballroom B The Grand Ballroom Auxiliary Conference Room 1,496 sq. ft.
